function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Survival of the virus on different surfaces for extended periods","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate sterilization of frequently used surfaces can lead to continued transmission of pathogens","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overuse of surface disinfectant chemicals like sodium hypochlorite, hydrogen peroxide, or alcohol can have toxic effects and irritate occupants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of antimicrobial coatings with novel materials","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Debatable antimicrobial mechanism of graphene materials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective antiviral composites","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on concentration and exposure time","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential reliance on unproven technology for virus inactivation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective antiviral drug and vaccine","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in scalability, manufacturing costs, and accessibility of COVID-19 vaccines","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
